title: New: Shivum Sharma – Only You
body:
London’s latest teenage sensation, **Shivum Sharma** releases_ Only You_ the b-side to his debut single, _Flicker_.

Yet again showcasing the voice that helped to attract the initial immediate attention, and calling Kwes back in on production duties, it’s moody, atmospheric and utterly heavenly.

excerpt.full: London’s latest teenage sensation, Shivum Sharma releases Only You the b-side to his debut single, Flicker. Yet again showcasing the voice that helped to attract the initial immediate attention, and calling Kwes back in on production duties, it’s moody, atmospheric and utterly heavenly.
